inclusion.criterion: Diagnostic of diabetes before the age of 35 years, with initial ketosis and requirement for permanent insulin treatment within 1 year of diagnosis and past or present diagnosis of diabetic retinopathy.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Diagnostic of diabetes before the age of 35 years and past or present diagnosis of severe diabetic retinopathy.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients presenting autoimmune diseases, HIV or HCV infections
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with glomerular filtration rate < 60 mL min-1 1.73 m2 without diabetic retinopathy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
